info.name: brick hill new style on old layout (light theme)
info.description:
THIS WORKS BEST IF USING THE DEFAULT THEME IN SETTINGS.

Want something easier on the eyes? Check this theme out: https://userstyles.org/styles/218407/
info.additionalInfo:
v1.1:
- Side ads are no longer shown due to errors with positioning. Rectangle and square ads are still shown because they do not cause problems with this theme
